query: Who created Pluribus and what inspired it?

songs.title: It's the End of the World as We Know It
songs.context: Opens the episode. Carol drives through empty Albuquerque streets as the Others' emergency broadcast plays. The irony lands differently when everyone's smiling.

songs.title: Tarzan Boy
songs.context: The Others have rebuilt a shopping mall. Carol watches them dance in perfect unison. She almost laughs.

songs.title: I Will Survive
songs.context: Carol's ringtone. Her phone rings in the empty house. She stares at Helen's name on the screen.

songs.title: Born to Be Wild
songs.context: Manousos's introduction. He drives his yellow car across the Chaco, windows down, refusing to stop at any checkpoint.

songs.title: Georgia on My Mind
songs.context: Carol finds a working jukebox in an abandoned bar. She plays this and sits alone, drinking. The first moment she lets herself grieve.

songs.title: Hot in Herre
songs.context: The Others throw Carol a party. Every song she's ever loved, played in sequence. It's terrifying.

songs.title: I'm Alright
songs.context: End credits. After everything ‚Äî the bar, the grief, the party ‚Äî this plays over black. Pure Gilligan.

songs.title: Aquarius / Sunshine In
songs.context: The Others' anthem. They sing it in every language simultaneously. Beautiful and deeply unsettling.

songsSectionDescription: Thomas Golubiƒá‚Äôs needle drops ‚Äî every song chosen to mirror Carol‚Äôs emotional state as she realizes what the Joining really means.

cards.title: Pluribus Is a 600-Year-Old Lie

cards.title: Body Snatchers (1956)
cards.context: Gilligan called this the single biggest influence on Pluribus

cards.title: The Thing (1982)

cards.title: Third from the Sun
cards.context: Named the protagonist ‚Äî then corrected its scientific error

cards.title: We (1924)

cards.title: Village of the Damned
cards.context: Children with hive-mind powers ‚Äî a direct Pluribus ancestor

discoveryGroups.title: The Gilligan Universe
discoveryGroups.description: Everything Gilligan created before Pluribus ‚Äî the shows that built the skills, the characters, and the reputation.

cards.title: Breaking Bad
cards.context: Proved Gilligan could sustain a 5-season moral spiral

cards.title: Better Call Saul
cards.context: Deepened the universe ‚Äî patience and slow-burn mastery

cards.title: El Camino

Mind control episode that planted the Pluribus concept

discoveryGroups.title: Literary Roots
discoveryGroups.description: The novels and philosophical works that underpin the Hive Mind concept and Pluribus‚Äôs themes of identity dissolution.

cards.title: Solaris
cards.context: An alien intelligence that mirrors your deepest fears back at you

cards.title: Blindsight
cards.context: Consciousness as evolutionary accident ‚Äî what if awareness is the bug?

cards.title: I Am Legend
cards.context: The last human in a world that's moved on without him

cards.title: We
cards.context: The glass city where privacy is abolished ‚Äî Orwell's source

cards.title: The Quiet Earth
cards.context: Waking up alone after everyone else has vanished

rawResponse.label: Raw Claude 3.5 Sonnet
rawResponse.text: Vince Gilligan created Pluribus. It is a science fiction television series that premiered on Apple TV+ in 2024. The show follows a small town that discovers an alien presence has been slowly infiltrating their community. Gilligan has cited various influences including classic sci-fi films and his own earlier work on The X-Files. The show has received generally positive reviews.

enhancedResponse.label: UnitedTribes Enhanced
enhancedResponse.text: Rich response with 16 verified entities, cross-media connections spanning film, literature, and music, plus actionable discovery links from authorized partnerships.
